矴字的基本解释

dìng

矴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dìng］
［《廣韻》丁定切，去徑，端。］
亦作“磸1”。亦作“碇1”。
(1)停船时沉入水底用以穏定船身的石块或系船的石礅。
(2)下碇；抛锚。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dìng］
["Guang Yun" Ding Ding cut, go to the path, end. ]
Also known as "磸1". Also known as "碇1".
(1) Stones that sink into the bottom of the water to stabilize the hull or mooring stones when the ship is parked.
(2) Lower anchor; drop anchor.
